column5: Enjoy nature on 2 acres near Eagle Mountain lake in this completely remodeled 1920's farmhouse. Family friendly 1,400 sq feet of indoor space plus a veranda for outdoor dining. 2 queen beds + a twin + a sleeper sofa. (7 person max occupancy.) A 20 minute drive to all of Fort Worth's major attractions. (10 minutes to the Fort Worth city limits.) But many of our guests confess to never leaving during their visits!
column8: Enjoy Nature on 2 acres-The Paso Roble- NW of FW
